Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals swept their last series against the Minnesota Twins.
The New York Yankees won the first two games of their series against the Chicago Cubs but lost the third game.
Cole Ragans has a 3.33 ERA in 29 starts this year and a 3.59 ERA in 50 career starts.
Luis Gil has a 3.24 ERA in 25 starts this year and a 3.35 ERA in 32 career starts.
Six of the Yankees' last seven games as home favorites have gone OVER the total runs line.
Five of the Royals' last six games have gone UNDER the total run line.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Yankees' last seven Wednesday night games against AL Central opponents.
